title: Playmaker 1.7.7 with Mecanim Actions & Daikon Forge 1.0.16 w
description:
Visual Scripting for Unity 3D 4.5 using Playmaker 1.7.7 and Daikon Forge GUI 1.0.16 needs a custom library which, of course, is available only to registered owners of DF-GUI. Since the original uploader hasn't keep up with new releases which solve the namespace issue that prevents using Daikon Forge with Playmaker, I edited the source code and commented out the offending lines: no DF-GUI Tooltips but everything else works as expected. Think of this release as a hotfix while somebody shares with us the newest versions.

 By the way, many Unity scripting assets released before Unity 4.5.x will probably need an upgrade and then again when Unity 5 becomes available. So it is time for registered users to upgrade their assets and share them again.

 Have fun and enjoy. Please comment, rate and seed,
